channel.title: Dragon-History Client IP Problem
channel.description: I found EGUI and client.java in the dragon-history file and I edited the three 0.0.0.0's in EGUI to my no-ip and changed the localhosts in client.java to my no-ip aswell, but when I run the Dragon-History client, it connects to the local host, not my no-ip. I need help so others can play.

item.title: Dragon-History Client IP Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tainted_2283 Tainted_2283
